name: part_004
file: tmp_【昭和歌謡祭】宝鐘マリン4周年記念LIVE【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [Nuy3XE8vjgc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section between Marine and Hakos Baelz introducing the next song.

subtitles.original: 山が燃える
subtitles.english: The mountain burns

subtitles.original: 戻れなくても もういいの
subtitles.english: It's okay even if I can't return

subtitles.original: くらくら燃える 地を這って
subtitles.english: Crawling on the dizzying, burning ground

subtitles.original: あなたと越えたい
subtitles.english: I want to cross with you

subtitles.original: 天城越え
subtitles.english: Crossing Amagi

subtitles.original:
ミオ…俺は君となら毎日
アスファルトのタイヤを切りつけたっていいと思ってるんだけど
subtitles.english:
Mio... If it's with you, I think it's okay to
cut through asphalt tires every single day...

subtitles.original:
返しやすいセリフにしろって言っただろ！
返しやすくなかっただろ！
subtitles.english:
I told you to make it an easy line to respond to!
That wasn't easy to respond to at all!

subtitles.original: というわけで、えー、次の曲ですね。はい、そうですね。
subtitles.english: Anyway, uh, the next song. Yes, that's right.

subtitles.original: Get Wild
subtitles.english: Get Wild

subtitles.original: Get Wild ですけども。いいですか？タイヤ切りつけていくのは。
subtitles.english:
It's 'Get Wild'. Are you really okay with
cutting through tires?

subtitles.original: 別に、あの、切りつけるのはいいんですけれども。
subtitles.english: Well, cutting through them is fine, but...

subtitles.original: あ、え、それでは聞いてください。Get Wild。
subtitles.english: Ah, well, please listen. Get Wild.

subtitles.original: アスファルト タイヤを切りつけながら
subtitles.english: While cutting through the asphalt tires

subtitles.original: 暗闇走りぬける
subtitles.english: Running through the darkness

subtitles.original: チープなスリルに身をまかせても
subtitles.english: Even if I give myself to cheap thrills

subtitles.original: 明日におびえていたよ
subtitles.english: I was afraid of tomorrow

subtitles.original: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain
subtitles.english: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain

subtitles.original: 誰かのために生きられるなら
subtitles.english: If I can live for someone's sake

subtitles.original: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream
subtitles.english: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream

subtitles.original: 何もこわくはない
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid of anything

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough ひとりでは
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough, alone

subtitles.original: 解けない愛のパズルを抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding the puzzle of love that can't be solved

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough この街で
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough, in this city

subtitles.original: やさしさに甘えていたくはない
subtitles.english: I don't want to depend on kindness

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck 君だけが
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck, only you

subtitles.original: 守れるものがどこかにあるさ
subtitles.english: There is something only you can protect somewhere

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck ひとりでも
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck, even alone

subtitles.original: 傷ついた夢をとりもどすよ
subtitles.english: I'll take back the wounded dream

subtitles.original: クルマのライトに kiss を投げては
subtitles.english: Throwing a kiss at the car lights

subtitles.original: 車道で踊るあの娘
subtitles.english: That girl dancing on the roadway

subtitles.original: 冷たい夜空をステージにして
subtitles.english: Making the cold night sky her stage

subtitles.original: 哀しくおどけていたね
subtitles.english: She was playfully teasing in sadness

subtitles.original: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain
subtitles.english: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain

subtitles.original: 誰かのために愛せるのなら
subtitles.english: If I can love for someone's sake

subtitles.original: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream
subtitles.english: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream

subtitles.original: きっと強くなれる
subtitles.english: I can surely become strong

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough ひとりでは
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough, alone

subtitles.original: 消せない痛み心に抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding the pain in my heart that won't go away

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough この街で
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough, in this city

subtitles.original: 自由をもてあましなくはない
subtitles.english: I don't want to have too much freedom

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck 君だけが
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck, only you

subtitles.original: 守れるものをみつけだしたら
subtitles.english: If I find something only you can protect

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck ひとりでも
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck, even alone

subtitles.original: 傷ついた夢をとりもどすよ
subtitles.english: I'll take back the wounded dream
